Federal Register: 155. Methiocarb (CAS No. 002032-65-7) (CERCLA; EPCRA EHS) (Ref. 8). Measured terrestrial acute toxicity data for wildlife include an oral LD sub 50 of 4.6 mg/kg for red-winged blackbirds. EPA believes that there is sufficient evidence for listing methiocarb on EPCRA section 313 pursuant to EPCRA section 313(d)(2)(C) based on the environmental toxicity data for this chemical.
